workspaces.description: Workspaces allow you to organize your notes into separate environments within a single Poznote instance - like having different notebooks for work, personal life, or projects.

page.title: Restore / Import
page.more_info_prefix: If you want to know more about why we have several restore methods:

individual_notes.summary: This will import {{fileText}} into the Poznote workspace without assigning them to a folder.

errors.too_many_files: Too many files selected. Maximum allowed: {{max}}. You selected: {{count}}.

individual_notes.summary_with_location: This will import {{fileText}} into workspace "{{workspace}}", folder "{{folder}}".
individual_notes.summary_zip_with_location: This will extract and import all files from the ZIP archive into workspace "{{workspace}}", folder "{{folder}}".

restore_from_backup.title: Want to restore from a Poznote ZIP backup file?

standard_restore.title: Is your backup file less than 500MB?
standard_restore.description: Upload a complete backup ZIP file. This method is fast and simple.
standard_restore.helper: Maximum recommended size: 500MB. For larger files, use chunked upload below.

chunked_restore.title: Is your backup file between 500MB and 800MB?
chunked_restore.description: Upload a complete backup ZIP file. Use this method to avoid HTTP timeouts and memory issues.
chunked_restore.helper: Recommended for files over 500MB to 800MB. Files are uploaded in 5MB chunks.

direct_copy_restore.title: Is your backup file over 800MB?
direct_copy_restore.description_prefix: For very large backup files, use this simple direct file copy method.

individual_notes.frontmatter_warning: If an MD note contains a folder key in a front matter, this value will override the one selected below. You must therefore first ensure that the folder already exists, otherwise the note will be created at the workspace root
individual_notes.files_info: Multiple files (max {{maxIndividualFiles}}) or single ZIP archive (max {{maxZipFiles}} files). These limits can be changed,
individual_notes.title: Want to import HTML, Markdown, text files or ZIP archives?
individual_notes.description_html:
Import individual HTML, Markdown or text files, or a ZIP archive containing multiple files.

The title will be automatically created from the file name (without the extension), unless a title key is defined in a front matter for MD files.
individual_notes.helper: You can select multiple files at once (maximum 50 files). Supported formats: .html, .md, .markdown, .txt

import_confirm.title: Are you sure?
import_confirm.body: This will replace note titles, tags, search index and metadata, but not the actual note content. This action cannot be undone.

complete_restore.title: Complete Restore?
complete_restore.warning_large_html:
Warning: This file is {{size}}MB. Standard upload may be slow or fail for large files. Consider using chunked upload instead.

This will replace your database, restore all notes, and attachments for all workspaces.
complete_restore.warning_html: Warning: This will replace your database, restore all notes, and attachments for all workspaces.
complete_restore.body_html: This will replace your database, restore all notes, and attachments for all workspaces.

chunked_restore.note_small_html:
Note: This file is {{size}}MB. Standard upload is usually faster for small files, but chunked upload will work too.

This will replace your database, restore all notes, and attachments for all workspaces.
chunked_restore.warning_html: Warning: This will replace your database, restore all notes, and attachments for all workspaces.

complete_restore_chunked.title: Complete Restore (Chunked)?
complete_restore_chunked.body_html: This will replace your database, restore all notes, and attachments for all workspaces.

import_notes.title: Import Notes?
import_notes.body: This will import all HTML files from the ZIP. Files will be added to your existing notes collection.

import_attachments.title: Import Attachments?
import_attachments.body: This will import all files from the ZIP to attachments folder. Files will be added to your existing attachments.

complete_restore_direct_copy.title: Complete Restore (Direct Copy)?
complete_restore_direct_copy.body_html: This will replace your database, restore all notes, and attachments for all workspaces.

import_individual_notes.title: Import Individual Notes?
import_individual_notes.body: This will import notes into the Poznote workspace.

alerts.no_zip_selected_restore: Please select a complete backup ZIP file before proceeding with the restore.
alerts.no_zip_selected_notes: Please select a ZIP file containing HTML notes before proceeding with the import.
alerts.no_zip_selected_attachments: Please select a ZIP file containing attachments before proceeding with the import.
alerts.no_zip_selected_chunked: Please select a complete backup ZIP file before proceeding with the chunked restore.
alerts.no_sql_selected_body: Please select a SQL file before proceeding with the database import.
alerts.no_files_selected_body: Please select one or more HTML or Markdown files before proceeding with the import.
alerts.too_many_files_body: You can import a maximum of {{max}} files at once. You have selected {{count}} files. Please select fewer files and try again.

no_file_selected.title: No File Selected
no_file_selected.body: Please select a file before proceeding with the import.

alerts.no_workspace_body: Please select a workspace for the imported notes.

standard.too_large: ‚ö†Ô∏è File is {{size}}MB. Standard upload may be slow or fail - consider using chunked upload below.

chunked.small_file_note: Note: For small files, standard upload is usually faster. But you can still use chunked upload if preferred.

line_breaks.title: Line Breaks
line_breaks.description: A single line break in edit mode creates a line break in the preview.

page.public_hint: Make a note public by clicking the cloud button in the note toolbar.

public.password_remove_hint: Leave empty to remove password protection.
